name: OCTAVE
acronym: Olympian Common Text And Vocabulary Engine
summary: A constraint-based, semantically compressed protocol for LLM-to-LLM communication and systemic orchestration.

origin.discovery: Semantic compression via mythological tokens during LLM experiments.
origin.evolution: From token-efficient shorthand to auditable system-level instruction protocol.

when_to_use.octave_prompt: Automated, multi-agent, auditable systems where structure must carry intent

compression.method: Use of mythological tokens and structured keys to replace verbose prose

operators_meaning.+: Synthesis: unifies elements into a greater whole

examples.goal: Compress long documents into structured, queryable form
examples.benefit: Preserves argument logic, enables precision querying

examples.goal: Inject rich business context or tension into concise prompts
examples.benefit: Models respond more insightfully due to structural clarity

parser_behavior.bias: LLMs recognize myth patterns better than they admit

license.requirement: Attribute to creator; free to adapt and build upon

author: Shaun Buswell
project_status: Stable, used in production orchestration; growing community feedback loop
